duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and sign new clients for payroll, tax, human resources, benefits, and more, and sell additional solutions to existing clients.
Cultivate relationships, set appointments, gather leads from established business partners, and spend time in the field closing business.
Implement a sales strategy targeted to decision-makers and business owners to capture new business.
Strategically cultivate additional business within existing accounts and make life-long friendships.
Serve as a trusted advisor, partner, and company ambassador to clients, internal partners, and overall network, demonstrating grace under pressure and the highest ethical standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in any field (College degree not required, but other work experience or military experience accepted)
